summary: This system card outlines the comprehensive safety measures implemented for GPT‑5.2-Codex. title: Lenovo’s joining the bandwagon with concept AI glasses
summary: Lenovo is the latest tech company to get bit by the smart glasses bug. The company just showed off a pair of concept AI glasses at CES 2026.
